attributes.action: ensure that a translation of the holy Qu'ran into English is freely available to all muslims in Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As we are all aware, the provision of the Bible in the vernacular, spread knowledge of its contents to all christians in Europe during the late middle ages.

Surely the provision of the Qu'ran in the vernacular will be of great assistance to al muslims and non-muslims in enlightening knowledge of Islam.  As long as it is restricted to classical Arabic (not even the second language of most British adherents let alone the first) interpretaion is retained to the select few, some of whom abuse it.

This democratisation of understanding can only be to the good of the moderate majority of the faith.
